channel.title: Really quick help
channel.description:
When I go to run my server I get this message
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 24 2616" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1985) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:553) at server.main(server.java:111) Online.[/code]
Its something to do with the autospawn.cfg but everything is perfect in it. [code]spawn = 1055 2808 3345 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3441 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3442 3559 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3436 3558 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3434 3560 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3431 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3434 3566 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3439 3565 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3443 3565 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3441 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3447 3549 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3446 3544 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3442 3541 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3438 3543 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3438 3546 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3434 3549 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1850 3087 9957 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 520 2612 3078 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 546 2614 3080 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 682 2615 3079 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 524 2616 3079 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 526 2611 3082 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 538 2615 3080 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3091 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3092 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3093 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3094 0 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] [/code]
I would love for anyone to just help me out here because when ever I try and add npcs this happens.

item.title: Really quick help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

tabs, but I just found out that if I save for every npc that I add then it works, but it would be really slow only adding in one npc and then saving

Read full topic

item.title: Really quick help

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Are you using spaces or tabs?

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

spawn = 524 2616 3079 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 526 2611 3082 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 538 2615 3080 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3091 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3092 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3093 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3094 0 0 0 0 0 1

Those donâ€™t appear to be spaced correctly. Make sure your using the tab key.

item.title: Really quick help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

When I go to run my server I get this message

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 24 2616" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1985) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:553) at server.main(server.java:111) Online.

Its something to do with the autospawn.cfg but everything is perfect in it.

spawn = 1055 2808 3345 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3441 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3442 3559 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3436 3558 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3434 3560 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3431 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3434 3566 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3439 3565 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3443 3565 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1615 3441 3563 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3447 3549 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3446 3544 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3442 3541 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3438 3543 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3438 3546 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 2783 3434 3549 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 1850 3087 9957 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 520 2612 3078 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 546 2614 3080 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 682 2615 3079 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 524 2616 3079 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 526 2611 3082 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 538 2615 3080 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3091 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3092 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3093 0 0 0 0 0 1 spawn = 494 2616 3094 0 0 0 0 0 1 [ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
